Tasks were assigned to clarify timelines, improve data accuracy, and ensure proper data mapping before proceeding with imports.

Action_Item: Develop a Real-Time KPI Dashboard
Problem_Description: Business performance is tracked in manual, lagging Excel spreadsheets, preventing real-time decision-making and quick identification of problematic accounts or churn risk.
Proposed_Solution: Use the new unified data source to feed a BI tool (e.g., PowerBI, Looker) to visualize real-time KPIs like sales, churn rate, and account health.

Action_Item: Design and Scope a Centralized Marketing & Operations Dashboard
Problem_Description: The team lacks a unified, at-a-glance view of key marketing and operational metrics, hindering quick decision-making and performance tracking.
Proposed_Solution: Identify all key data indicators (e.g., sales by SKU, customer engagement, inventory levels) and 'backwards engineer' a dashboard using a BI tool connected to the central data source.

Action_Item: Design & Develop Prototype Competitor Intelligence Dashboard
Problem_Description: The company lacks real-time, automated insight into competitor pricing, products, and strategy, relying on manual checks or outdated information.
Proposed_Solution: Alex to architect and build a prototype dashboard that scrapes data from competitor sites and presents it in a user-friendly interface.

Action_Item: Define and Design the Ideal Sales KPI Dashboard
Problem_Description: The sales team lacks a centralized, accurate, real-time dashboard for performance tracking, making it difficult to manage the team and make data-driven decisions.
Proposed_Solution: Mike to provide a clear blueprint by listing all required KPIs, sketching a wireframe of the layout, and confirming the desired visual style for the dashboard.

Action_Item: Build & Deploy a Live, Visual KPI Dashboard
Problem_Description: Leadership relies on a cumbersome, 18-tab Excel spreadsheet for business intelligence, which is slow to update and difficult to interpret.
Proposed_Solution: Using an approved mockup, connect a BI tool to the newly established data source/middleware to build and deploy a live, easy-to-understand visual KPI dashboard.

Action_Item: Create Mockup of the 'Ben's Dashboard'
Problem_Description: There is a risk of wasting development time building a dashboard that doesn't meet the stakeholder's needs if the vision isn't confirmed visually first.
Proposed_Solution: Create a visual mock-up of the dashboard, including inventory health bars and activity logs, to get stakeholder buy-in on the concept before any complex coding begins.

Action_Item: Develop v1.0 of Competitor Price Scraping Tool
Problem_Description: The team spends significant manual effort reactively checking competitor prices for key items, which is inefficient and not proactive.
Proposed_Solution: Build a script to monitor competitor prices for a pre-defined list of critical SKUs and deliver a daily email digest or dashboard with the findings.

Proposed_Solution: Develop and deploy a 'one-click' automated script or workflow that ingests the raw data and outputs the final report in the required format, freeing up a full workday per week.

Problem_Description: The company lacks a strategic, visual tool to analyze the true cost of failures, making it difficult to identify trends and make data-driven decisions.
Proposed_Solution: Using the newly tracked COPQ data, build a comprehensive BI dashboard that visualizes failure costs by SKU, carrier, and customer region.

Action_Item: Establish New Sub-Distribution Agreements
Problem_Description: The company is missing a current opportunity with a new CLO, leaving 'money on the table'.
Proposed_Solution: Prioritize and finalize negotiations to set up sub-distribution agreements to capture immediate revenue.

Action_Item: Develop Strategy to Re-enter the B2C Market
Problem_Description: The company is missing out on 'ridiculous, by 80%' margins by not selling directly to consumers.
Proposed_Solution: Create a business plan to re-launch a B2C channel, including a dedicated retail site, potentially targeting the budtender network initially.

Action_Item: Develop and Test a Limited Business-to-Consumer (B2C) Model
Problem_Description: The company is missing out on the high-margin B2C market and has no direct relationship with the end consumer.
Proposed_Solution: Launch a pilot B2C program featuring a limited selection of 20-25 top-selling products to test the market and operational requirements.

Problem_Description: The company lacks a direct channel to end-users and risks being disintermediated by dispensaries.
Proposed_Solution: Scope the development of a consumer-facing mobile app that uses QR codes on product packaging to capture user data and build a direct relationship.

Action_Item: Develop an Exclusive, Monetized Budtender Education & Certification Platform
Problem_Description: Current budtender training is not proprietary and doesn't create a strong community or revenue stream. The company is reliant on third-party platforms.
Proposed_Solution: Rebuild the training program on a private platform (e.g., SKOL), making it exclusive, visually engaging, and potentially charging a fee to create a certified network of elite budtenders.

Action_Item: Formalize Experiential Marketing & After-Party Program
Problem_Description: The company needs a structured way to build deep relationships with high-level decision-makers outside of the crowded trade show floor.
Proposed_Solution: Create a formal program for hosting exclusive, sponsored after-parties and satellite events at major trade shows, with a clear process for securing sponsors and managing invitations.

Action_Item: Secure & Provide Access to Competitor Intelligence Data
Problem_Description: A key strategic project (competitor dashboard) is blocked because the consultant lacks login credentials for competitor websites needed for data scraping.
Proposed_Solution: Adam to secure the list of competitor websites and login credentials from Phil and provide them to Alex.

Action_Item: Develop 'Budtender Olympics' Platform Concept Deck
Problem_Description: The company needs an innovative way to capture the budtender market, build a community, and create a proprietary data asset outside of traditional marketing.
Proposed_Solution: Alex to build a presentation deck outlining the gamified training platform concept. Mike to provide industry feedback. Both to present the refined concept to leadership for buy-in.

Action_Item: Pursue Strategic Partnership with Dutchy POS
Problem_Description: A potential high-value partnership for in-dispensary advertising and data collection has stalled, leaving a strategic market advantage on the table.
Proposed_Solution: Mike to re-engage with Brett on the status of the Dutchy proposal, framing it as a critical initiative for market dominance and future data acquisition.

Action_Item: Establish LuvBuds PR Operations in Puerto Rico
Problem_Description: The company has created a new legal entity, LuvBuds PR LLC, but needs to establish its physical and operational presence in Puerto Rico to realize tax and strategic benefits.
Proposed_Solution: The CEO will travel to Puerto Rico to meet with CPAs, attorneys, and real estate agents to finalize the operational setup, including office space and local professional services.

Action_Item: Acquire and Integrate Competitor 'Aux Ark'
Problem_Description: An opportunity has arisen to acquire a competitor, Aux Ark, providing access to their inventory, customer list, and other assets at a low cost.
Proposed_Solution: Complete the acquisition of Aux Ark. Develop and execute a plan to integrate their inventory, migrate their customers, and leverage their assets to grow LuvBuds' market share.

Action_Item: Plan and Execute Full Company Relocation to New Facility
Problem_Description: The company is outgrowing its current space and has secured a new 9,400 sq. ft. facility at 4001 Holly Street, requiring a complex move without disrupting operations.
Proposed_Solution: Develop and execute a detailed, multi-phase project plan for moving all office and warehouse operations to the new facility over a set period (e.g., Thanksgiving weekend).

Action_Item: Formalize and Launch 'Swag Supply' as a Business Unit
Problem_Description: The custom merchandise business ('Swag Supply') is operating ad-hoc and needs to be formalized into a proper business unit to scale effectively.
Proposed_Solution: Develop a complete business plan for Swag Supply, including its own website, processes, pricing, business manager, and go-to-market strategy for a formal launch.

Action_Item: Develop and Launch 'SirEEL' In-House Product Brand
Problem_Description: The company relies heavily on third-party brands, limiting its control over margin and brand equity. An in-house brand is needed to drive profitability.
Proposed_Solution: Develop the 'SirEEL' brand from concept to launch, including product selection (glass, batteries, trays), logo and packaging design, procurement, and sales strategy.

Action_Item: Launch a House of Brands Management Structure
Problem_Description: As in-house brands like SirEEL and Swag Supply grow, they will require dedicated brand management resources separate from the core LuvBuds distribution business.
Proposed_Solution: Create a formal 'House of Brands' organizational structure, with dedicated Brand Managers responsible for the P&L, marketing, and strategy of each individual in-house brand.

Action_Item: Formalize monday.com Board as Interim Issue Tracker
Problem_Description: Customer service issues are being tracked inconsistently, leading to data loss and process gaps while a permanent solution is being developed.
Proposed_Solution: Officially designate the existing monday.com board as the single source of truth for tracking customer issues and ensure all CS reps are trained on its consistent use.

Action_Item: Create a 'Culture Committee' and Formalize a Mission/Values Reinforcement Program
Problem_Description: As the company grows rapidly through hiring and acquisitions, the unique 'LuvBuds' culture is at high risk of dilution or being lost entirely.
Proposed_Solution: Establish a cross-departmental 'Culture Committee' responsible for codifying the company's core values and implementing programs (rituals, awards) to reinforce them during scaling.

Action_Item: Hire a Head of Customer Experience (CX) and Map the End-to-End Customer Journey
Problem_Description: Customer service is reactive, focused on fixing problems. The company lacks a proactive, strategic owner for the entire customer lifecycle, from first marketing touch to post-sale support.
Proposed_Solution: Hire a senior executive (VP of CX) to map the entire customer journey, identify friction points, and implement programs to proactively increase loyalty and lifetime value.

Action_Item: Build a Predictive Analytics Team for Proactive Decision-Making
Problem_Description: The current BI focus is on historical reporting (what happened). The company lacks the capability to predict future outcomes (what will happen).
Proposed_Solution: Hire dedicated data scientists to build predictive models for key business challenges, such as customer churn probability, inventory demand forecasting, and lead scoring.

Action_Item: Audit and Optimize Software Subscription Costs
Problem_Description: The company is likely wasting money on underutilized paid software subscriptions.
Proposed_Solution: Conduct a full audit of all recurring software costs. Cancel unused subscriptions and prioritize free tools where possible.

Action_Item: Secure Additional Lines of Credit
Problem_Description: Future growth and inventory needs will require more capital than the current $3.5M line of credit provides.
Proposed_Solution: Proactively engage with financial institutions to increase the company's available credit to support planned expansion.

Action_Item: Create a Strategic Plan for Post-Banking Reform
Problem_Description: The company's valuation and operations will change significantly once cannabis banking is resolved, and it needs to be prepared.
Proposed_Solution: Develop a strategic plan outlining the steps to take (e.g., valuation adjustments, operational changes) once federal banking reform for cannabis is passed.

Action_Item: Research Viability of Bitcoin for Payments and Financing
Problem_Description: The company is not exploring alternative financial instruments like cryptocurrency.
Proposed_Solution: Assign a team to research the practicalities, risks, and benefits of accepting Bitcoin as payment and exploring its use for loans or grants.

Action_Item: Scope and Develop AI-Powered Collections Agent
Problem_Description: Accounts receivable collections is a manual, time-consuming process for the finance department.
Proposed_Solution: Scope the development of an automated AI voice agent to handle initial collections calls and follow-ups.

Action_Item: Re-Automate and Validate the Customer Billing Process
Problem_Description: The billing process is a top pain point, currently manual and slow after a previous failed automation attempt caused customer confusion.
Proposed_Solution: Fix the underlying data integrity issues between systems, then re-implement and thoroughly test an automated billing and invoicing system.

Action_Item: Deploy AI-Powered Accounts Payable (AP) Automation
Problem_Description: Manually entering data from incoming invoices into the financial system is a repetitive, time-consuming, and error-prone task for the AP team.
Proposed_Solution: Implement a tool that uses AI/OCR to read vendor invoices and automatically post quantities, pricing, and other details into Dynamics.

Action_Item: Create a Real-Time Financial & Operational KPI Dashboard
Problem_Description: Leadership lacks real-time visibility into key metrics, slowing down strategic decision-making and the ability to identify issues like stale inventory.
Proposed_Solution: Use a BI tool (e.g., PowerBI) to connect to Dynamics and other data sources to build a dashboard tracking KPIs like sales, AR/AP, and inventory levels.

Action_Item: Conduct Audit of All Software Subscriptions for Utilization
Problem_Description: The company is likely wasting money on underutilized or redundant software subscriptions (e.g., Monday.com) that also contribute to data silos.
Proposed_Solution: Perform a company-wide audit of all SaaS subscriptions, assess their ROI, and develop a plan to consolidate or eliminate tools to save costs and reduce complexity.

Action_Item: Implement Automated Accounts Receivable (AR) Workflow
Problem_Description: Chasing late payments is a manual, time-consuming process, and inconsistent follow-up contributes to a 40% customer churn rate and poor cash flow.
Proposed_Solution: Use the unified data source to trigger a sequence of automated emails and/or AI-powered calls for past-due accounts, flagging only non-responsive accounts for manual intervention.

Action_Item: Fix Core Revenue Recognition & Inventory Data Flow
Problem_Description: Invoicing and revenue reporting are blocked by SKU/phantom inventory issues and a broken data flow between systems, causing major accounting headaches and delaying sales.
Proposed_Solution: Conduct a deep dive into the Dynamics/BigCommerce integration to fix SKU and inventory synchronization, enabling real-time invoicing and margin reporting.

Action_Item: Brainstorm a Future Sales-Led Collections Process
Problem_Description: The responsibility for collections may shift to the sales team, which currently lacks a defined process or tools to manage this effectively.
Proposed_Solution: Mike to begin brainstorming a new collections process, considering the automated reminders and tools that would be required within HubSpot to support the sales team.

Action_Item: Audit & Remap Primary Customer Identifier from Email to Ship-To Address
Problem_Description: Using email as the unique identifier creates a critical financial flaw, allowing customers to bypass credit limits by creating multiple accounts.
Proposed_Solution: Formally change the primary unique customer identifier across all systems to the 'Ship-To Address'. This requires a signed decision, system audit, and remapping.

Action_Item: Pilot Automated 30-Day Payment Reminder Emails
Problem_Description: The collections process is manual, leading to delayed payments, poor cash flow, and significant time spent by the accounting team on follow-ups.
Proposed_Solution: Create a simple automated workflow that triggers a 30-day payment reminder email to customers when an email filter/label is applied by accounting.

Action_Item: Develop 'Human in the Loop' Email Automation Pilot
Problem_Description: Manually drafting and sending routine emails for prepayments and past-due notices is a time-consuming, repetitive task that delays both order fulfillment and collections.
Proposed_Solution: Build an automation script that populates email templates with data from Dynamics and saves them to a 'Drafts' folder for Nett's final review and approval before sending.

Action_Item: Pilot Test and Iterate on Automated Draft Emails
Problem_Description: The accuracy of the automated system must be validated before it can be trusted for full deployment, especially given past automation failures.
Proposed_Solution: Nett to review all auto-generated draft emails daily for a set period, with a feedback loop for Alex to make iterative improvements and debug the script.

Action_Item: Deploy Full Automation for Low-Risk Email Scenarios
Problem_Description: The 'human in the loop' pilot is a means to an end; the ultimate goal is to remove the manual review step for proven, low-risk scenarios to achieve full time savings.
Proposed_Solution: Once the pilot proves consistently accurate, get leadership approval to transition the system to send emails automatically for the defined, low-risk scenarios.

Action_Item: Scope Automation of Monthly Customer Statements
Problem_Description: Manually generating and sending monthly statements is a high-volume, repetitive task, and a previous attempt to automate it failed, indicating a need for a new approach.
Proposed_Solution: Begin discovery for a reliable, automated system for generating and sending monthly statements, applying the lessons learned from the email automation pilot.

Action_Item: Automate Bank & Credit Card Transaction Reconciliation
Problem_Description: The reconciliation process takes 5-10 days of manual work because the core module in Dynamics is broken and transaction data must be pulled manually from 6+ portals.
Proposed_Solution: First, fix the Dynamics Reconciliation Module. Then, implement an API-based solution (e.g., Plaid) to automatically pull transaction data from all bank accounts into Dynamics.

Action_Item: Automate Accounts Payable (AP) Invoice Data Entry
Problem_Description: Manually entering data from PDF invoices received via email (e.g., shipping expenses) is a repetitive, low-value task prone to error.
Proposed_Solution: Implement an AI-powered email parsing tool to monitor the AP inbox, automatically read PDF invoices, extract key data, and create draft bills in Dynamics for one-click approval.

Action_Item: Automate Payroll Journal Entry from Paycor
Problem_Description: The payroll journal entry is created by manually copy-and-pasting data from Paycor into Dynamics after each payroll run, a repetitive and needless task.
Proposed_Solution: Investigate Paycor's API/reporting capabilities and create a script or integration to automatically pull the payroll ledger and create the corresponding journal entry in Dynamics.

Action_Item: Implement Granular Cost of Failure (COPQ) Tracking
Problem_Description: The company has no visibility into the true financial cost of missing, broken, or mis-shipped items because credits are not tied to specific SKUs.
Proposed_Solution: Mandate a new protocol in Dynamics to tie all credits directly to the original SKU and sales order, enabling a weekly 'Cost of Poor Quality' report.

Action_Item: Automate Accounts Receivable (AR) Collections Workflow
Problem_Description: Manually sending reminders for past-due invoices is time-consuming for accounting staff and leads to delays in cash flow.
Proposed_Solution: Implement an automated email workflow with staged reminders for past-due invoices to improve cash flow and free up staff time.

Action_Item: Establish a Line of Credit Self-Funded by the Company
Problem_Description: The company needs a line of credit to manage cash flow for inventory and staffing, but wants to avoid traditional bank financing initially.
Proposed_Solution: Finalize the plan to self-fund a line of credit by March 1st, as discussed and approved at the board meeting.

Action_Item: Implement Performance-Based Bonus Structure for Warehouse Staff
Problem_Description: Standard raises do not effectively incentivize top performance in the warehouse. A new system is needed to reward productivity, attendance, and quality.
Proposed_Solution: Create and roll out a monthly performance-based bonus system based on metrics for promptness, attendance, production output, overtime participation, and quality of work (accuracy).
Owner(s): Will Wrona, Adam Rubin, Rob Simmons

Action_Item: Launch Reviewed Financials Initiative with Cherry Bekaert
Problem_Description: To secure new lines of credit and prepare for potential capital raises, the company requires formal 'Reviewed Financials' from an external accounting firm.
Proposed_Solution: Engage the accounting firm Cherry Bekaert to begin the financial review process, starting in November and continuing through tax season.

Action_Item: Secure New Line of Credit with First Fidelity Bank
Problem_Description: The company's growth requires access to more significant and traditional lines of credit, which has been a challenge in the cannabis-adjacent space.
Proposed_Solution: Finalize all documentation and close the new Line of Credit with First Fidelity Bank, marking a significant milestone in the company's financial stability.

Action_Item: Establish Separate Accounting and Operations for Puerto Rico Entities
Problem_Description: The company has multiple legal entities in Puerto Rico (SirEEL, Swag Supply, LuvBuds PR) that need to be run on a separate, simpler accounting system to ensure compliance and clarity.
Proposed_Solution: Set up QuickBooks for all Puerto Rico entities. Recreate all 2024 transactions to ensure accurate, segregated financial records and manage inter-company cash flow properly.

Action_Item: Implement New Product Pricing and Tiered Margin Policies
Problem_Description: Pricing is not consistently optimized to maximize profit. A formal policy is needed to guide pricing decisions and protect margins across different product categories.
Proposed_Solution: Implement a new pricing framework that sets required margin targets for each product category (e.g., Glass at 65%+, Papers at 28-40%) and introduces step-down volume discounts to incentivize larger orders.

Action_Item: Implement Departmental Profit & Loss (P&L) Responsibility
Problem_Description: There is a lack of financial discipline and accountability at the department level because VPs do not have visibility into or responsibility for their own P&L.
Proposed_Solution: Work with each VP to establish departmental budgets and create monthly P&L reports, making each department head responsible for managing their expenses as a percentage of revenue.

Action_Item: Develop Advanced Financial Modeling for Strategic Scenarios
Problem_Description: Standard financial reporting is insufficient for evaluating complex M&A deals, international market entry ROI, or long-term capital allocation strategies.
Proposed_Solution: Build a sophisticated corporate finance function capable of creating detailed financial models to support high-stakes strategic decisions made by the Board and C-suite.

Action_Item: Evaluate and Restructure Sales Leadership
Problem_Description: The current sales leadership may not have the experience required for C-level engagement and managing large national programs.
Proposed_Solution: Assess the current sales director's fit. Consider moving them to a Key Account Manager role and recruiting a new director with top-level industry experience.

Action_Item: Overhaul Warehouse Staff Hiring Process
Problem_Description: The current hiring process may not be effectively screening for highly committed and suitable warehouse employees.
Proposed_Solution: Implement a more rigorous, multi-stage hiring process (e.g., 'casting calls,' 'speed dating') to better assess candidate attributes and commitment.

Action_Item: Create a Collaborative Company Culture Book
Problem_Description: The company's culture is not formally defined, which can lead to inconsistency and a weak sense of shared identity.
Proposed_Solution: Initiate a company-wide project to create a 'cultural book' where all employees contribute to defining the values and meaning of working at Luvbuds.

Action_Item: Reinforce Punctuality Standards in the Office
Problem_Description: There is a 'laxatasicalness' regarding when office staff arrive for work.
Proposed_Solution: All managers to clearly communicate and consistently enforce expectations for office start times.

Action_Item: Create 'Who's Who' Guide for Navigating Internal Dynamics
Problem_Description: The consultant needs to understand team dynamics to effectively manage change and identify key allies and potential resistance to AI adoption.
Proposed_Solution: Phil to prepare notes defining the roles, influence, and receptiveness to change for key team members.

Action_Item: Implement AI-Assisted Job Description Drafting
Problem_Description: Manually transcribing notes from hiring manager meetings and drafting job descriptions is a time-consuming, creative bottleneck.
Proposed_Solution: Record brainstorming meetings, use an app to transcribe the audio, and feed the transcript into an AI (like ChatGPT) to instantly generate a draft job posting.

Action_Item: Implement AI-Assisted Investigation Summarization
Problem_Description: Creating accurate, detailed summaries and reports from employee investigation interviews is a manual and time-intensive process.
Proposed_Solution: Record investigation interviews (with consent), transcribe the audio, and use an AI to summarize key facts, allegations, and timelines, aiding in faster report writing.

Action_Item: Automate Labor Law Update Monitoring
Problem_Description: Jeff spends 6-8 hours per week manually monitoring various government websites and attending webinars to track labor law changes, a highly repetitive and inefficient task.
Proposed_Solution: Develop a web scraping tool or use an AI to analyze webinar transcripts to automatically monitor sources and generate a summary of relevant legal changes for review.

Action_Item: Automate Initial Resume Screening on Indeed
Problem_Description: Manually reviewing every applicant on Indeed to filter out unqualified candidates is a significant time sink for every open position.
Proposed_Solution: Create an RPA script or browser automation to log into Indeed and automatically reject candidates who do not meet a predefined set of non-negotiable, keyword-based requirements.

Action_Item: Automate Daily Attendance Tracking & Reporting
Problem_Description: Jeff manually checks timecards in PayCor and updates a separate attendance tracker daily, a redundant dual-entry process.
Proposed_Solution: Investigate PayCor's API or data export capabilities to build a script that automatically pulls attendance data and flags exceptions, eliminating manual review.

Action_Item: Evaluate Psychological Profiling for Hiring & Team Dynamics
Problem_Description: The company's hiring process could be enhanced with more data-driven insights into candidate fit and team communication styles.
Proposed_Solution: Alex to prepare an overview of a psychological profiling methodology; Jeff to review and consider a pilot program for a new hire or team to test its value.

Action_Item: Identify and List an 'AI Champion Squad'
Problem_Description: Successful AI adoption requires identifying and empowering internal champions who are eager to learn and lead the change.
Proposed_Solution: Adam to create a list of employees who are enthusiastic about adopting new AI technologies to serve as a pilot group for new tools and workflows.

Action_Item: Plan and Scope a Self-Hosted AI & Process Training Platform
Problem_Description: Rolling out new AI tools and workflows will fail without a structured, scalable system for training employees and fostering adoption.
Proposed_Solution: Alex to plan the creation of a self-hosted training system (like Skool or a custom solution) to teach employees how to use the new AI-powered tools and processes.

Action_Item: Launch a Gamified SOP & Internal Training Platform
Problem_Description: Standard training methods are often ineffective and boring, and there is no central, engaging repository for SOPs and company knowledge.
Proposed_Solution: Build out a 'gamified' training platform using a tool like Notion or a dedicated LMS, populated with the video SOPs and other training content created during the project.

Action_Item: Procure and Distribute Full Company Directory & Org Chart
Problem_Description: The project team lacks a complete directory and org chart, blocking effective communication and the identification of correct stakeholders for tasks.
Proposed_Solution: Zach to generate a complete organizational chart and contact list and distribute it to all key project stakeholders.

Action_Item: Develop and Implement a Formal Employee Onboarding Checklist
Problem_Description: The lack of a standardized onboarding process for new employees leads to inconsistencies in system access and IT setup, causing delays and frustration.
Proposed_Solution: Create and implement a standardized, cross-departmental checklist for onboarding new employees that covers all IT, systems access, and HR tasks.

Action_Item: Create Pilot Interactive Video SOP
Problem_Description: Traditional, text-based training methods are proving ineffective for younger employees, leading to inconsistent work and repeated questions.
Proposed_Solution: Choose a simple, high-volume task, record a short video of the process with narration, and embed it into a document to create the first interactive SOP as a proof-of-concept.

Action_Item: Assess Value of Visual SOPs for Warehouse Training
Problem_Description: While some employees are skeptical of video-based training, it may still hold significant value for training new hires in physical, hands-on roles like receiving and fulfillment.
Proposed_Solution: While on-site, observe the Receiving and Fulfillment departments to assess if GoPro-based visual SOPs would genuinely add value for training new hires in those specific roles.

Action_Item: Ensure All Traveling Employees Sign the 'Rules of Travel' Document
Problem_Description: To ensure compliance and protect the company, all employees who travel for business must formally acknowledge the company's travel and expense policies.
Proposed_Solution: Distribute the 'Rules of Travel' document to all relevant staff and create a system to track and confirm receipt of signed acknowledgments before any company-paid travel.

Action_Item: Hire and Onboard a Chief Operating Officer (COO)
Problem_Description: The company's rapid growth has outpaced its operational leadership, requiring a senior executive to professionalize warehouse operations, vendor relations, and inventory management.
Proposed_Solution: Conduct a search, interview candidates, and hire a COO to oversee all operational aspects of the business. Integrate them into the executive team.

Action_Item: Update and Distribute Official Employee Handbook
Problem_Description: The company handbook is outdated and needs to be reviewed and updated to reflect current policies and procedures, including new rules around workplace conduct. This task is noted as being 'only 1 year late'.
Proposed_Solution: Review the existing handbook, make all necessary updates, and distribute the revised version to all employees for acknowledgment and signature.

Action_Item: Plan and Execute Annual Company Holiday Party
Problem_Description: The annual holiday party is a key cultural event, and planning is required to secure a venue and ensure a successful celebration for employees and their significant others.
Proposed_Solution: Organize the annual Christmas party, confirming the date (Dec 9th), location (100% Agave), and managing RSVPs for all employees and their guests.

Action_Item: Establish and Manage an 'Employee of the Month' Program
Problem_Description: There is no formal program to consistently recognize and reward outstanding employee performance, which can impact morale and motivation.
Proposed_Solution: Create and manage a monthly 'Employee of the Month' program to publicly recognize top-performing individuals and foster a culture of appreciation.

Action_Item: Draft and Execute Executive Employment Agreement Amendments
Problem_Description: Executive compensation (overrides) is tied to top-line revenue, which does not incentivize a focus on bottom-line profitability.
Proposed_Solution: Draft and have executives sign amendments to their employment agreements that restructure their incentive pay to be based on company net profit targets.

Action_Item: Establish a Formal 'Innovation Lab' or R&D Process
Problem_Description: New business ideas (like the 'Budtender Olympics' or B2C pilots) are generated sporadically. There is no structured process to vet, fund, and test new ventures.
Proposed_Solution: Create a small, cross-functional 'Innovation Lab' with its own budget and mandate to rapidly prototype and test new revenue streams, reporting directly to the CEO.

Action_Item: Automate HubSpot Daily Call Menu Report
Problem_Description: Sales team members spend manual effort daily pulling their call lists from HubSpot.
Proposed_Solution: Create a script or use an automation tool to automatically generate and distribute the daily call menu.

Action_Item: Grant Super Admin Access to Project Lead in HubSpot
Problem_Description: The primary consultant (Alex) lacks the required Super Admin permissions in HubSpot, blocking him from investigating issues, fixing integrations, or accessing critical tools.
Proposed_Solution: Mike Martin (VP of Marketing) to immediately grant Super Admin permissions to Alex in HubSpot.

Action_Item: Implement Centralized Knowledge Base & Project Management Tool
Problem_Description: Information is siloed across the company, leading to inefficiency, communication breakdown, and a lack of accountability on tasks.
Proposed_Solution: Deploy a unified platform like Notion to act as a central knowledge base and project tracker for all departments.

Action_Item: Fix the BigCommerce to HubSpot Integration
Problem_Description: The integration between BigCommerce and HubSpot is broken, causing duplicate company records, data silos, and allowing customers with outstanding balances to place new orders.
Proposed_Solution: Follow the HubSpot setup guide to properly re-configure the BigCommerce integration, ensuring correct mapping of company and contact data to establish a single source of truth.

Action_Item: Use AI for Automated Competitive Intelligence
Problem_Description: The company lacks a systematic way to monitor competitor pricing and product introductions (e.g., Medusa Distribution).
Proposed_Solution: Develop or deploy a tool to scrape competitor websites for pricing and product data, providing automated alerts on market changes.

Action_Item: Set Up and Utilize the HubSpot Sandbox Environment
Problem_Description: The consultant needs a safe environment to test fixes and new configurations without affecting live customer and operational data.
Proposed_Solution: Once Super Admin access is granted, activate and configure the included HubSpot sandbox environment for all development and testing purposes.

Action_Item: Investigate On-Premise AI Solutions for Data Privacy
Problem_Description: Using third-party AI services like OpenAI could expose sensitive proprietary company data.
Proposed_Solution: Explore and test open-source AI models that can be run on internal company servers, ensuring all proprietary data remains within company control.

Action_Item: Establish Two-Way Data Sync Between Dynamics, HubSpot, and BigCommerce
Problem_Description: Key financial data like refunds and credits processed in MS Dynamics do not update back to HubSpot or the e-commerce platform (BigCommerce), creating data discrepancies and operational blind spots.
Proposed_Solution: Investigate and implement an API-based solution or dedicated connector to enable two-way data synchronization between MS Dynamics, HubSpot, and BigCommerce.

Action_Item: Grant Consultant Full Access to All Company Systems
Problem_Description: Consultant lacks necessary logins for core systems (BigCommerce, HubSpot, Dynamics), blocking all technical analysis.
Proposed_Solution: Adam Rubin, authorized by Phil, to provide Alex with all required software logins and access to inaccessible data files.

Action_Item: Investigate Dynamics & BigCommerce Integration Failure
Problem_Description: The integration between the core ERP (Dynamics) and e-commerce platform (BigCommerce) is broken or inefficient, likely causing major operational issues.
Proposed_Solution: Alex to research the integration issue, evaluate the current vendor (Stoic), and determine the feasibility and cost of a fix or alternative solution.

Action_Item: Map Core System Workflows and Customer Journeys
Problem_Description: Processes for how customers and data flow through the company's software stack are not formally documented, leading to inefficiency.
Proposed_Solution: Alex to create flow charts mapping key workflows, to be finalized after meeting with the IT team.

Action_Item: Scope and Develop a Unified KPI Dashboard
Problem_Description: The current multi-tab Google Sheet for KPI reporting is inefficient, manual, and difficult to interpret quickly.
Proposed_Solution: Scope the project to replace the Google Sheet with a dynamic, visual, and automated KPI dashboard pulling from all relevant systems.

Action_Item: Research On-Premise AI Solutions for Proprietary Data
Problem_Description: Using cloud-based AI for highly sensitive competitive or financial data poses a potential security risk.
Proposed_Solution: Investigate the feasibility of implementing an on-premise AI solution that operates in a 'vacuum' to protect proprietary data.

Action_Item: Fix Core ERP Implementation Flaws
Problem_Description: The initial Microsoft Dynamics setup was flawed, causing widespread data integrity issues, manual workarounds, and process bottlenecks across the company.
Proposed_Solution: Develop a formal Statement of Work (SOW) for ERP best practices and engage the IT team/consultant to correct the fundamental configuration.
Owner(s): David, IT Team, Alex, Daniel, Zach

Action_Item: Fix Bi-Directional Data Flow Between ERP and BigCommerce
Problem_Description: Incomplete data sync (e.g., credit memos not flowing to the POS) creates inaccurate customer balances in BigCommerce, causing confusion and support tickets.
Proposed_Solution: Rework the integration (API calls, middleware) to ensure all financial documents (invoices, credit memos) sync in both directions between Dynamics and BigCommerce.

Action_Item: Implement Automated Address Verification Tool
Problem_Description: Staff manually verify if shipping addresses are business addresses to comply with regulations, which is a slow and inefficient step in order processing.
Proposed_Solution: Integrate a third-party address verification API/tool into the order entry process to automate compliance checks.

Action_Item: Correct Flawed Customer Creation Logic in POS
Problem_Description: The POS system (BigCommerce) creates duplicate customer accounts because it uses email as the sole unique identifier, which is not suitable for B2B.
Proposed_Solution: Change the system logic to create/identify customers based on a primary key from the ERP (customer number) or a combination of phone/address.

Action_Item: Improve Data Integration Between HubSpot (CRM) and ERP
Problem_Description: The sales team in HubSpot lacks a complete, accurate view of customer financial status from the ERP, leading to communication gaps.
Proposed_Solution: Establish a robust data sync that pulls key ERP data (e.g., credit status, order history) into HubSpot to create a single source of truth for sales.

Action_Item: Evaluate In-House vs. Consultant Capabilities for ERP Modifications
Problem_Description: The company may be over-relying on costly third-party consultants for ERP changes that could potentially be handled internally.
Proposed_Solution: Assess the internal IT team's ability to access and manipulate the ERP's programming to determine if future changes can be made more cost-effectively.

Action_Item: Explore On-Premise AI Solutions for Confidential Data
Problem_Description: Using public AI clouds for sensitive financial documents poses a potential risk of corporate data being harvested for external model training.
Proposed_Solution: Research and evaluate the feasibility of private cloud or on-premise AI solutions for handling confidential financial data securely.

Action_Item: Investigate Vectorizing Databases for Enhanced AI Data Retrieval
Problem_Description: As data volumes grow, standard AI queries may become inefficient. Vectorizing could improve AI's ability to access large, complex internal datasets.
Proposed_Solution: Research vector databases and their potential application for improving the performance and accuracy of internal AI tools accessing company data.

Action_Item: Consolidate Core Business Systems into a Unified Data Source
Problem_Description: Data from Dynamics, HubSpot, and Big Commerce is siloed and inaccurate, preventing effective reporting, automation, and a single view of the customer.
Proposed_Solution: Implement middleware or custom APIs to create a central data warehouse to serve as a single source of truth for all departments.

Action_Item: Resolve Microsoft Dynamics API Access Bottleneck
Problem_Description: A third-party specialist is a bottleneck for accessing and modifying the core ERP's API, preventing internal development and system integration.
Proposed_Solution: Investigate options to gain internal access for custom codes, circumvent the specialist, or reverse-engineer the required API calls to unblock data projects.

Action_Item: Implement Product Bundling and Mystery Box Functionality
Problem_Description: The company needs tools to increase average order value and a mechanism to clear excess inventory without deep discounting.
Proposed_Solution: Implement bundling software within Big Commerce and develop a process for creating and offering 'mystery boxes' to dispensaries.

Action_Item: Automate Inventory & Price Synchronization Across All Sales Platforms
Problem_Description: Inventory and pricing data is not synchronized between the ERP (Dynamics) and sales platforms (BigCommerce, Leaf Link, etc.), causing short-shipping, customer frustration, and manual work.
Proposed_Solution: Leverage or build APIs to connect all sales platforms directly to the central inventory system in Dynamics for real-time, automated updates. Utilize tools like Make.com for interim connections if needed.

Action_Item: Implement Guardrails and Pre-Made Workflows for AI Usage
Problem_Description: Unstructured use of AI can lead to inconsistent outputs or unintended consequences, like damaging website SEO.
Proposed_Solution: Establish and document pre-made prompts and specific workflows for common AI tasks (e.g., writing product descriptions, generating social posts) to ensure consistency and safety.

Action_Item: Evaluate Data Scraping and Integration Tools
Problem_Description: The company needs tools to gather competitive intelligence and connect disparate applications that lack native integrations.
Proposed_Solution: Research and test tools like Browse.AI (for data scraping) and Make.com/Zapier (for interoperability) to enhance data collection and workflow automation.

Action_Item: Implement Google Sheets as an Automated Intermediary Ledger
Problem_Description: Data transfer between BigCommerce and Dynamics is cluttered and not real-time, relying on manual Excel updates which are inefficient and error-prone.
Proposed_Solution: Set up a centralized Google Sheet with API plugins to automatically pull data from BigCommerce and Dynamics, serving as a live 'quick reference guide' and temporary data hub.

Action_Item: Investigate Dynamics Vendor Lock-in and Explore Alternatives
Problem_Description: The company is being held 'hostage' by its current Microsoft Dynamics vendor, preventing agile development and potentially costing the company significant money.
Proposed_Solution: The IT team to conduct a technical investigation into the current setup to find points of leverage. Simultaneously, evaluate the cost and feasibility of migrating away from Dynamics.

Action_Item: Plan Consolidation of Swag Supply into Main LoveBuds Entity
Problem_Description: The separate BigCommerce entity for Swag Supply is described as 'clunky' and creates operational and accounting inefficiencies.
Proposed_Solution: Develop a project plan to migrate the Swag Supply store, data, and processes into the main LoveBuds BigCommerce and Dynamics instance to streamline operations.

Action_Item: Grant AI Consultant Access to Metabase Reporting Tool
Problem_Description: The AI consultant cannot begin technical analysis of the current data structure without access to the reporting system.
Proposed_Solution: Justin to contact the IT Team to provide Alex with the necessary login credentials for reports.lobuds.co.

Action_Item: Analyze Metabase & Research Dynamics API Integration Options
Problem_Description: The technical limitations and integration possibilities of the current systems (Metabase, Dynamics) are unknown, which could block the development of a permanent solution.
Proposed_Solution: Alex to review the Metabase data structure and research direct API access to Dynamics, evaluating the current partner (Strabo) and potential 'backdoor' access.

Action_Item: Conduct & Deliver Full Audit of Departmental Software & Tools
Problem_Description: The consultant lacks a clear picture of the current technology stack, subscriptions, and their perceived value, which is necessary for strategic planning.
Proposed_Solution: Adam to compile and deliver a detailed list of all current software, noting costs, perceived value, and any known issues or inadequacies.

Action_Item: Curate a Private, Industry-Specific AI Knowledge Base
Problem_Description: Public AI models lack deep, specialized industry context, leading to generic outputs. The AI's 'brain' needs to be trained on high-quality, relevant data.
Proposed_Solution: Alex to begin sourcing and compiling industry-specific documents (e.g., 'bud tender books', research) to create a curated knowledge base for fine-tuning a private AI model.

Action_Item: Investigate Google Sheets 'Middleware' Data Bridge Feasibility
Problem_Description: Core systems (Dynamics, HubSpot) do not sync correctly, and direct API access is a known issue, requiring a creative solution to create a single source of truth.
Proposed_Solution: Alex to investigate using Google Sheets as a middleware solution, test integrations with tools like N8N/Make, and create a technical flowchart of the proposed data architecture.

Action_Item: Clean, Segment, and Re-engage HubSpot CRM Contacts
Problem_Description: The HubSpot CRM is cluttered with old, unsegmented data, rendering it useless for effective sales and marketing campaigns and contributing to reporting inaccuracies.
Proposed_Solution: Mike to finalize cleaning the contact list and define segmentation logic. Alex to design a re-engagement campaign, followed by a decision to archive or wipe/re-import data.

Action_Item: Develop Initial Data Flowchart for Core Systems
Problem_Description: Data integrity issues cannot be diagnosed or fixed without a clear, visual understanding of how data currently moves between Big Commerce, the Strabo Connector, Dynamics, and HubSpot.
Proposed_Solution: Alex and Daniel to create a foundational flowchart that maps the complete data path, which will serve as the primary diagnostic tool for all data-related projects.

Action_Item: Obtain Full Admin/Sandbox Access to All Core Systems
Problem_Description: The consultant cannot perform a technical audit or begin development work without access to the company's core software platforms.
Proposed_Solution: Zach and Daniel to provide Alex with the necessary credentials for Microsoft Dynamics (dev environment), HubSpot, Big Commerce, and Freshservice.

Action_Item: Prototype an 'AI Ticket Assistant' for IT Support
Problem_Description: The IT team's #1 communication pain point is receiving support tickets with incomplete information, which causes significant delays and back-and-forth communication.
Proposed_Solution: Create a proof-of-concept AI-powered form that asks leading questions and guides the user to provide all necessary information before a Freshservice ticket can be submitted.

Action_Item: Evaluate Feasibility of Middleware vs. Google Sheets Data Bridge
Problem_Description: A decision is needed on the best technical path for creating a data 'source of truth' that is scalable and avoids long-term vendor lock-in.
Proposed_Solution: Review the existing Google Sheets project and compare its capabilities and scalability against a paid, third-party middleware solution, then present a formal recommendation.

Action_Item: Investigate Local API Access to Microsoft Dynamics
Problem_Description: The company's reliance on the third-party Strabo connector for data pulls is a potential bottleneck, point of failure, and source of unnecessary cost.
Proposed_Solution: Daniel and Alex to investigate the DevOps environment and Dynamics documentation to determine if a custom connection can be built using a local API to bypass the connector.

Action_Item: Conduct Audit of All HubSpot Plugins & Connectors
Problem_Description: The critical data sync issue between HubSpot and Big Commerce may be solvable with existing, underutilized tools, but no one has performed an audit.
Proposed_Solution: Alex to investigate the three HubSpot/Big Commerce plugins previously identified in the HubSpot marketplace to determine if they can solve the sync issue without custom development.

Problem_Description: New software is often acquired by departments without proper IT vetting, leading to integration problems, security risks, and 'shadow IT'.
Proposed_Solution: Create a formal intake form and checklist that other departments must complete and submit to IT before any new software vendor is engaged or a subscription is purchased.

Action_Item: Develop an Internal, AI-Powered Chatbot Knowledge Base
Problem_Description: Subject matter experts are constantly interrupted with repetitive questions (the 'Paul Revere' effect), which disrupts deep work and wastes valuable time.
Proposed_Solution: Create an internal chatbot trained on all the new SOPs and company knowledge, allowing staff to self-serve answers to common process and operational questions.

Action_Item: Map All Customer Onboarding Channels and Data Fields
Problem_Description: Customers can create accounts through multiple platforms (BigCommerce, LeafLink, etc.), each collecting different data, creating inconsistencies and loopholes.
Proposed_Solution: Create a comprehensive flowchart and report detailing every platform where a customer account can be created and what data fields are collected by each.

Action_Item: Standardize Customer Data Input Forms to Require Separate Billing/Shipping Addresses
Problem_Description: Current account creation forms do not mandate separate addresses, which is a prerequisite for using 'Ship-To Address' as the new unique identifier.
Proposed_Solution: Update all customer-facing account creation forms across all platforms to include mandatory, separate fields for 'Billing Address' and 'Shipping Address'.

Action_Item: Implement Middleware for Two-Way Data Sync Between Dynamics & BigCommerce
Problem_Description: The lack of two-way data sync between core systems is the root cause of the broken customer portal and inaccurate invoice data, creating massive customer friction.
Proposed_Solution: Build and deploy a functional data pipeline, potentially using Google Sheets or Airtable as middleware, to enable reliable two-way data synchronization.

Action_Item: Relaunch and Validate a Functional Customer Self-Service Portal
Problem_Description: Customers cannot accurately view their order history, open invoices, or make payments online, leading to a poor experience and high manual workload for accounting.
Proposed_Solution: Once the data sync middleware is functional, re-enable, test, and launch the customer portal, allowing customers to self-serve for payments and account info.

Action_Item: Implement Parent-Child Account Structure in Dynamics
Problem_Description: The system lacks a mechanism to automatically link multiple user accounts created by a single company, which is the root cause of the credit limit loophole.
Proposed_Solution: Configure Microsoft Dynamics to automatically link new user accounts to a single 'Parent' customer record based on a matching Ship-To Address identifier.

Action_Item: Obtain Read-Only/API Access to All Core Systems
Problem_Description: The project is completely blocked without access to core systems (Dynamics, Metabase, Big Commerce, HubSpot) for technical analysis.
Proposed_Solution: Create a formal, written request for system credentials and API keys, justifying the need for each, and escalate to management if there are delays.

Action_Item: Clarify API Access Policy with Dynamics Partner
Problem_Description: It is unclear if direct API access to Dynamics is possible or if all requests must go through a costly third-party partner, which is a major project risk and potential bottleneck.
Proposed_Solution: Get a definitive answer from management regarding the integration policy with the certified partner ('Travels') to understand all technical and financial constraints.

Action_Item: Create and Maintain a Live System Architecture Diagram
Problem_Description: The company lacks a single source of truth for how its software systems and data flows interact, leading to departments implementing solutions that break other workflows.
Proposed_Solution: Create and continuously update a visual diagram showing how all systems (Dynamics, Big Commerce, etc.) and teams interact, making it accessible to all decision-makers.

Action_Item: Research Company-Wide PC Voice-to-Text Dictation Tool
Problem_Description: Employees on PCs lack an efficient voice-to-text tool for emails and notes, which is a missed opportunity for a simple, company-wide productivity boost.
Proposed_Solution: Investigate and recommend a high-quality, PC-compatible voice-to-text dictation tool (equivalent to Mac's Super Whisper) for company-wide deployment.

Action_Item: Secure Full Read-Only/Admin Access to Core Systems
Problem_Description: The consultant cannot validate assumptions, investigate APIs, or begin technical audits without access to Dynamics, BigCommerce, HubSpot, and Authorize.net.
Proposed_Solution: Formally request and obtain full necessary access credentials for all relevant systems, escalating to management if needed.

Action_Item: Investigate and Document Existing API Capabilities & Limitations
Problem_Description: The technical constraints of the current integrations (Strabo, Tepoly) are unknown, creating a major risk for planning new, robust data sync solutions.
Proposed_Solution: Contact the relevant partners (Strabo, Tepoly) and internal IT to request and review all technical documentation for the existing APIs connecting core systems.

Action_Item: Design & Implement Parent/Child Account Structure in Dynamics
Problem_Description: The lack of a parent/child account hierarchy allows customers to create new 'orphan' accounts to bypass credit limits, creating a critical revenue leakage vulnerability.
Proposed_Solution: Formally define the business logic for parent/child accounts, plan a data migration for existing accounts, and work with partners to configure this structure in Dynamics.

Action_Item: Rebuild B2B Customer Portal Data Sync for 100% Accuracy
Problem_Description: The customer-facing B2B portal is untrustworthy and unusable, showing inaccurate invoices, credits, and payments due to a broken data sync, causing customer frustration and support calls.
Proposed_Solution: Decommission the current problematic API and develop a new, robust integration that perfectly mirrors the new Parent/Child structure and all financial transactions from Dynamics.

Action_Item: Evaluate PC-Compatible Voice-to-Text Productivity Tools
Problem_Description: Employees using PCs lack efficient dictation tools, a missed opportunity for a simple productivity gain, but the value compared to existing native tools is unknown.
Proposed_Solution: Find and test a PC-compatible voice-to-text tool and evaluate if it offers a significant advantage over the native Google Gemini feature currently in use.

Action_Item: Deploy a Company-Wide Call Recording System
Problem_Description: The lack of call recordings creates liability risks, prevents resolution of 'he said/she said' disputes, and eliminates a valuable data source for training.
Proposed_Solution: Procure and install a call recording solution for all customer-facing phone lines to mitigate liability, create training assets, and provide definitive records of conversations.

Action_Item: Conduct Cost-Benefit Analysis for HubSpot Service Hub Upgrade
Problem_Description: The current CS tech stack is fragmented and inefficient. A potential solution (upgrading HubSpot) needs to be evaluated for its financial and operational ROI.
Proposed_Solution: Perform a formal cost-benefit analysis, including the 'soft costs' of current inefficiencies, to make a data-driven 'Go/No-Go' decision on upgrading to HubSpot Service Hub Enterprise.

Action_Item: Launch Cross-System Data Hygiene & Standardization Initiative
Problem_Description: Customer and financial data is unreliable due to duplicates, missing information, and inconsistent entry, which prevents accurate reporting and effective strategy.
Proposed_Solution: Initiate a formal project to cleanse, merge, and standardize all data across HubSpot and Dynamics, and establish mandatory fields for all new entries.

Action_Item: Pilot an AI-Powered Email-to-Ticket System
Problem_Description: Manually creating tickets from customer service emails is a repetitive data-entry task that slows down response times.
Proposed_Solution: Test a service that can parse incoming customer service emails and automatically create a ticket/task in the designated system (monday.com or HubSpot).

Action_Item: Transition from P21 to Microsoft Dynamics 365 ERP
Problem_Description: The company decided to cancel its implementation of the P21 ERP system and is now moving forward with Microsoft Dynamics 365, requiring a full project reset.
Proposed_Solution: Re-engage with the MS Dynamics 365 implementation partner, transfer all existing process documentation, and establish a new project timeline with a target go-live date.

Action_Item: Launch and Optimize 'Cones N' Papers' Dropship Website
Problem_Description: The company acquired ConesNpapers.com to create a new, competitive revenue stream for paper products but needs to fully launch and integrate it into operations.
Proposed_Solution: Activate all relevant SKUs, finalize the drop-ship business model with suppliers like US Wholesale, and manage the site as a distinct sales channel.

Action_Item: Develop a Proactive Regulatory and Government Affairs Strategy
Problem_Description: The company is currently reactive to legislative changes (like the PACT Act). A $300M industry leader must proactively shape its regulatory environment.
Proposed_Solution: Build a government affairs function to monitor pending legislation, build relationships with policymakers, and advocate for regulations favorable to the company's business model.

Problem_Description: The company needs a formalized program to incentivize budtenders, a key influencer group, to promote its products.

Action_Item: Scope and Develop a DTC Live Shopping & Influencer Program
Problem_Description: The company wants to build a direct-to-consumer channel but lacks the infrastructure and sales model.

Action_Item: Plan and Host Independent Trade Show After-Parties

Action_Item: Use AI for Scalable, Engaging Short-Form Video Content Creation
Problem_Description: Creating a consistent flow of engaging social media content is a manual and time-consuming process.

Action_Item: Host 'Budtender Olympics' to Build Community and Collect Data
Problem_Description: The company needs a unique, scalable way to engage with budtenders, build a proprietary network, and gather data for future B2C efforts.

Problem_Description: The current 'one-stop shop' messaging is too broad and doesn't effectively highlight the products that drive the most revenue and customer interest.

Problem_Description: The company spends $1,000/month on Design Drop and may have redundant/underutilized AI tool subscriptions, representing wasted budget.

Action_Item: Develop a Strategy for a Dedicated B2C Retail Website

Action_Item: Develop a 'Budtender Olympics' Event Concept
Problem_Description: The company needs a large-scale, in-person event to build brand loyalty, collect user data, and create a strong community network.

Problem_Description: The company is not effectively leveraging influencers for marketing or exploring potential merchandise management revenue streams.

Problem_Description: The sensitive nature of the industry leads to shadow bans on major platforms, limiting social media marketing effectiveness.

Problem_Description: Static product images and mockups are less engaging than video. The company needs a scalable way to create compelling video assets.

Problem_Description: Current video content may be too long or lack the excitement needed to capture and hold the audience's attention effectively.
Proposed_Solution: Implement a new video standard: compress length to under one minute, add motion/hyper music in the first 20 seconds, and clarify the 'hook' or value proposition immediately.

Problem_Description: Apparel is being sold as a simple product rather than a high-value marketing asset for the customer.

Problem_Description: Lead capture at trade shows relies on manual processes like exchanging business cards, which is slow and inefficient.

Problem_Description: Lead capture at trade shows is inefficient and lacks a 'wow' factor. There's also concern about prospects taking free mockups to competitors.

Action_Item: Develop and Execute a Comprehensive Social Media Strategy
Problem_Description: Social media is an underutilized channel and has been identified as a major focus for the quarter to drive brand awareness and new leads.

Action_Item: Design and Finalize New Trade Show Booth for MJBIZ
Problem_Description: The company needs a new, larger, and more professional booth for the key MJBIZ trade show to accurately represent its market leadership position.

Action_Item: Launch 'LuvBuds University' as a Budtender Education Platform
Problem_Description: The company needs a scalable and engaging way to educate budtenders, a key influencer group, on its products and retail best practices.

Problem_Description: The company wants to utilize direct mail as a marketing channel but lacks a standardized, professional mailer to send to prospects and customers.

Problem_Description: Inventory planning is not optimized, causing stockouts or overstocking, which impacts sales and capital. The process is not predictable enough for new account acquisitions.
